info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:04PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lake County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 904 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mundelein, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waukegan, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Round Lake Beach, Vernon Hills, Zion, Grayslake, Libertyville, Round Lake, Antioch, Wauconda, Fox Lake, Lake Villa, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Gages Lake, Long Grove, Hawthorn Woods and Park City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
